name: 張玉鈍
objective:
供應鏈管理(Supply Chain Management，SCM) 是利用一連串有效率的方法，來整合供應商、製造商、倉庫和商店，使得商品與服務在一個適當的數量、適當的地區以及適當的時間下被製造出來，期望在一個令人滿意的服務水準下，追求供應鏈整體系統成本的最小化。供應鏈管理的目標是要使整個供應鏈系統以及成本具有效率。而整個系統的成本，包含將產品從原料到在製品、以至於最後製成品的運輸及配銷等成本，必須使其最小化。因此，這目標的重點不僅僅是要減少運輸成本及減少存貨，而是要將系統方法導入供應鏈管理裡。由於供應鏈管理是以有效整合供應商、製造商、倉庫及商店為目標，所以它包含許多企業活動的層級，從策略層級(Strategic)到戰術層級(Tactical)，以至於到作業層級(Operational)。
Supply Chain Management (SCM) uses a series of efficient ways to integrate suppliers, manufacturers, warehouses and retailers, making goods and services in an appropriate areas, as well as the right time to be manufactured under the out, look forward to a satisfactory standard of service, to reach the supply chain to minimize overall system cost. Supply chain management goal is to make the whole supply chain system as well as cost efficiency. The cost of the system, including the product from raw materials to the products, so that the final products such as transport and distribution costs, we must make it minimized. Therefore, the focus of this goal is not only to reduce transportation costs and reduce inventory, but rather to approach into supply chain management. Due to supply chain management is to effectively integrate suppliers, manufacturers, warehouses and shops as the goal, so it contains a number of the level of entrepreneurial activity, from the strategic level (Strategic) to tactical level (Tactical), so the operating level (Operational) .
